snippet.title: Release Trailer - StarRevenge 6 - Luigi's Adventure v1.3
snippet.description:
StarRevenge 6 - Luigi's Adventure

Link: https://romhacking.com/hack/star-revenge-6-luigis-adventure

Music in this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dDKav...

This is a 121 stars long major sm64 hack. All 15 main courses, side levels and the overworld are replaced.
Course 12 to 15 are side game and are not really necessary for trying to beat the hack on any%.

The hack starts easy and gets harder with the time.

Note: The game deleats sometimes part of levels, I don't know why, but it does. I'm still searching why.
Note: The music can disappear if you collect in some levels the 100 coin star.
Another note: A boss fight is normally harder, since I don't like how easy the bosses in the normal sm64 were, so be careful if you get into on of these fights.

Credits:
Levels by BroDute
Music from SMW Ceantral (like Megaman511again)
Textures from SMW Central: Texture packs from Vinnyboiler, messian, Mr. GreenThunder and some by BroDute.
